roleset.name: comfortably above average temperature

role.descr: warm thing (not 'it', if refering to empty weather pronoun)

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, warm-v.01, cold-j.01.

example.name: weather- don't tag 'it' as arg1, just like you wouldn't with 'raining'.
example.text: I 'm tired of seeing joggers in short sleeves and shirts in January . It 's not THAT warm .

roleset.name: be socially welcoming, nice
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on cold-j.02

example.name: args 0, 2
example.text: Jessica was warm to her right off the bat.
